plugins.name: Auto Play Gifs
plugins.author: noodlebox
plugins.description: Autoplay gifs without having to hover.

plugins.name: Better Emote Sizes
plugins.author: Metalloriff
plugins.description: Increases the size of emotes upon hovering over them, and allows you to set a default and hover size for large and small emotes.

plugins.name: Character Counter
plugins.author: Jiiks, square
plugins.description: Adds a character counter to channel textarea.

plugins.name: Copy Code
plugins.author: Unknown
plugins.description: Lets you copy code from a code block.

plugins.name: GMedia
plugins.author: gn0mesort
plugins.description: Adds support for HTML5 media files. Now includes looping audio/video. Based on mediaSupport.plugin.js

plugins.name: Owner Tags
plugins.author: noodlebox
plugins.description: Show a tag next to a server owner's name

plugins.name: Quoter
plugins.author: Samogot & Hammock & Natsulus
plugins.description: Reply to people with a button, quoting full message or selected text

themes.name: ClearVision Amethyst
themes.author: Zerthox
themes.description: A mystical, purple theme with customizable colors & background!

themes.name: ClearVision Emerald
themes.author: Zerthox
themes.description: A peaceful, green theme with customizable colors & background!

themes.name: ClearVision Ruby
themes.author: Zerthox
themes.description: A raging, red theme with customizable colors & background!

themes.name: ClearVision Sapphire
themes.author: Zerthox
themes.description: A chilly, blue theme with customizable colors & background!

themes.name: Compact+
themes.author: ElitePrime
themes.description: Makes some things a bit compact

themes.name: COMPOZY
themes.author: Swan Song (@SonataSwanSong)
themes.description: Compozy is a tasteful modification of the default theme that aims to maintain Discord's cleanliness and breathability, while slimming down on most of the oversized elements and wasteful negative space. Supports both Light/Dark modes and Cozy/Compact modes.

themes.name: Dark Purple
themes.author: ElitePrime
themes.description: A theme that's dark, but also PURPLE!!! :)

themes.name: Rounded Glass
themes.author: Megamit
themes.description: A simple theme to satisfy that make it easy to swap out the background

themes.name: ExotiCNova
themes.author: Phil (Katana)
themes.description: Dark Theme with the ability to add your own background if you choose so. Built-in Theme Fixer by Gimo.
